name: SCP: Secret Laboratory
summary: Deep within a secure underground facility, a sudden containment breach allows many of the secured anomalies to escape from their chambers — without peaceful intentions. Assist the Foundation in resecuring the facility, help the Insurgency in their goal to capture it, or wreak havoc as an SCP in a frantic bid to escape.
